title: Strengthening Practical App Development Skills: Expanding Mathematical Thinking through Computer Science Metaphors

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and logical reasoning skills grounded in professional experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will analyze core metaphors in computer science (e.g., algorithms, abstraction, networking) and apply them to mathematical problem-solving
Learners will reinterpret concepts of new computational environments (cloud, distributed systems) as mathematical frameworks through metaphorical thinking

Learners design creative problem-solving strategies using three computer science metaphors (traffic control, pipeline processing, etc.) in real-world scenarios (e.g., cloud system scaling, data pipeline optimization), submit a 5-minute presentation (PPT/script), and achieve "excellent" ratings in two or more of three evaluation criteria (clarity, creativity, feasibility) from peers and instructors.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
